attributes.action: give the british people the right to own and carry  arms in the defence of themselves, and the familys
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in these increasingly violent times, where the publics lives are at risk every day. I ask for the right to carry arms, such as hand guns/knives/police batons, and the right to keep larger type firearms in the home. this requst is not for a free for all, but to allow the polic to issue permits to people to allow the carrying/ownership of such items. this would allow law aibiding people to defended themselves for those who carry such item with no regaurd for the law.

rejection.details: There are other similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=self+defence&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=schizophrenia&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
